verses.roman:
lakṣa lakṣa loka āise tāhā dekhibāre
tāṅre dekhi' punarapi yāite nāre ghare

synonyms: lakṣa lakṣa—millions upon millions; loka—people; āise—come; tāhā—that; dekhibāre—to see; tāṅre dekhi'-after seeing Him; punarapi—again; yāite—to go; nāre—are not able; ghare—home.
translation: "Many millions upon millions of people come to see Him, and after they see Him, they cannot return home.
